stats_note: XP reflects the cumulative impact of each project.
For each entry, the project is distributed across the stack according to its percentages.
Scores are then normalized based on the 95th percentile to remain comparable.
Bronze: 0–200 XP · Silver: 200–500 XP · Gold: 500–900 XP · Platinum: 900–1500 XP · Diamond: 1500+ XP.
